麛麛麛

Related Character(s): 麑
Связанный символ (и): 麑

麛字的基本解释

麛
mí
幼鹿：“山鹿藏窟穴，虎豹吞其麛。”
泛指幼兽：“国君春田不围泽，大夫不掩群，士不取麛、卵。”

麛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mí］
［《廣韻》莫兮切，平齊，明。］
(1)幼鹿。
(2)泛指幼兽。
(3)捕猎幼兽。

麛字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【鹿字部】　麛； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1511第08
【唐韻】莫兮切【集韻】【韻會】緜批切【正韻】緜兮切，?音迷。【說文】鹿子也。　又獸初生皆曰麛。【禮·曲禮】春田，士不取麛卵。【註】生乳之時，重傷其類。　又同麑。【禮·玉藻】麛裘靑豻褎，絞衣以裼之。【論語】作麑。

麛字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
麛字的起名意思

暂无。

fawn
Basic explanation of words
fawn
mí
Young deer: "Mountain deer hides in caves, tigers and leopards swallow its monks."
Refers to cubs in general: "The monarch does not encircle the spring field, the doctor does not hide the group, and the scholar does not collect the eggs or eggs."
fawn
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mí］
["Guangyun" Mo Xi cut, flat, bright. ]
(1) Young deer.
(2) Refers to cubs in general.
(3) Hunting cubs.
fawn
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Deer Department] 　麛; Kangxi strokes: 20; Page number: page 1511-08
[Tang Yun] Mo Xi cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Spread and cut [Zheng Yun] Spread and cut, you are a fan of music. [Said the text] Lu Zi also.　The first birth of another beast is called nun. 【Rite·Music Ceremony】In Spring Field, scholars do not take eggs. [Note] When giving birth to breast milk, it is seriously injured.　The same thing again. 【Ritual·Yuzao】The fur and the fur are sturdy, and the clothes are twisted to make it. [The Analects] As a noodle.

сущ.
